Question
========

A 95% confidence interval for the mean IQ in the population is (93; 108). Then, for a hypothesis test with H~0~: *μ* = 100 against H~a~: *μ* ≠ 100 that I. the power of the test is high._____________. II. the P-value is greater than 0.05.

Answerlist
----------

* I is false and II is true.
* I is TRUE and II is false.
* I and II are TRUE.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* I is false and II is TRUE: Correct
* I is TRUE and II is false: Incorrect
* I and II are true: Incorrect
